entity.query: UPDATE ST SET AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]' AND ST.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = [$PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID];

UPDATE ST SET AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]'

UPDATE ST SET ST.CHECK_RECORD = 1, AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = 0 FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = 1 AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]';

UPDATE ST SET SELECTED_CHECKBOX = [$SELECTED_CHECKBOX] FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]' AND ST.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = [$PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID];

UPDATE ST SET SELECTED_CHECKBOX = [$SELECTED_CHECKBOX] FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND CHECK_RECORD = 1 AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]'

UPDATE ST SET CHECK_RECORD = 0,ST.SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 0 FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND ST.SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 1 AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]'
UPDATE [$TABLE_NAME] SET CHECK_RECORD = 0,SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 0 WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID];

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID =[$SESSION_ID] AND ST.AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = '1' AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]') SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN "PERIOD" P ON P.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND ST.SESSION_ID =[$SESSION_ID] AND ST.SELECTED_CHECKBOX = '1' AND P.PERIOD_DATE BETWEEN '[$START_DATE]' AND '[$END_DATE]') SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT STAH.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID) FROM [$TABLE_NAME] STAH [$FILTER_JOIN] WHERE STAH.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND STAH.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] [$SELECTED_TABLE_CHECK] [$FILTER_CONDITION];

JOIN dbo.PROJECTION_DETAILS PD ON PD.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = STAH.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID AND PD.PROJECTION_MASTER_SID = [$PROJECTION_MASTER_SID] JOIN dbo.CCP_DETAILS CCP ON CCP.CCP_DETAILS_SID = PD.CCP_DETAILS_SID JOIN dbo.COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CCP.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN dbo.CONTRACT_MASTER CO ON CO.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = CCP.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID JOIN dbo.ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = CCP.ITEM_MASTER_SID
